Description:
LIGHT FILLED HOME AWAITING ITS NEXT CHAPTER
Set on a generous allotment of approximately 640m2, this home offers a fantastic opportunity for all buyers alike, combining both size with a flexible floorplan. For those seeking a quiet, comfortable and convenient lifestyle where your investment is assured there is no need to look further. This family home has been lovingly maintained over the years. A light-filled lounge room is complete with gas heating. The kitchen is the heart of the home being centrally located, overlooking both dining area and sitting area which includes a built in TV, a split system and gas fire place offering comfort all year round. There is direct access from the kitchen with doors opening to outside patio yard, featuring a secure low maintenance garden. Offering three bedrooms, central 2 way bathroom, separate toilet plus laundry. The large carport allows access to the back yard where you'll find two garden sheds, a water tank and more room for a garage or extension STCA.
Located within close proximity to schools, jetty, golf club and parklands. With the amount of scope this property offers, it certainly should attract interest from first home buyers, young families and savvy investors seeking a property with so much potential. An inspection truly is a must!
Insights: 36 Maraboora Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Downsize But Not Compromise!
If you are looking to downsize but don't want to feel hemmed in then this delightful 3 bedroom unit may be just what you are looking for. It is light filled and offered in as new condition. The north facing and open plan kitchen (dish washer, gas & electric cooking, pantry), meals & lounge has sliding doors leading to the neat rear garden. All bedrooms are of a good size, have robes and split system air-conditioners for year round comfort. The master bedroom has a full ensuite bathroom. There is internal access from the homes' single garage which also has double sliding doors at the rear creating the option of using it as an extra living space if desired. Gas heating, split system air-conditioning, external awnings and quality fittings through-out. Set in small complex of 5 homes overlooking park-lands and a short walk to all amenities this is a very appealing property and definitely worthy of an inspection.
Insights: 1,15 Parkway Place, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 2 other 3 bedroom unit in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
The Cheapest House in Clifton Springs
This classic brick veneer house has a large open plan lounge area with brick and timber feature walls. Solid timber kitchen with electric cooking, plenty of work space, and adjoining dining area. Huge main bedroom with built in robes. Central bathroom and laundry. Ducted gas heating and split system air conditioning. With a large rear yard there is room for garaging boats, caravans and trailers. Extend it for a growing family or enjoy as a weekender by the bay. Inspect any time. All offers considered.

Description:
LARGE BLOCK WITH PARK NEARBY
Looking for a home to accommodate the family with room around you? Rare find 765m2 land (approx.).
Practical kitchen space overlooking the living area. Large spacious living looking out onto a good sized yard and covered entertainment space. Newly laid carpet has freshened the home up.
This light and airy home is ready and waiting for its new occupants to move in and make it theirs.
In a quiet dead end street with a park literally next door for the kids and the animals to play.
Why Clifton Springs? It has everything you require to enjoy all aspects of life. Working, playing and relaxing. Offering schools, sporting, service clubs, medical, supermarkets, public transport, restaurants, cafes, walking, riding, fishing and golfing. Oh I nearly forgot there's a ferry from Portarlington to Docklands ten minutes down the road. Another ferry from Queenscliff to Sorrento twenty minutes in the other direction and we are only twenty minutes from the city of Geelong. Something for everyone.
Insights: 3-4 Sanctuary Cove, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
DELIGHTFUL FAMILY HOME
Featuring a formal lounge, delightful open plan modern kitchen, dining and living room flowing out to an alfresco entertainers area plus 4 bedrooms including master with WIR & ensuite, this is the ideal home for those wanting space and comfort in a thriving location on the Bellarine. The outside of the home enjoys landscaped gardens, a powered bungalow and plenty of space for the cars or boat! This well presented family home is immaculately maintained and is set on approx 607m2 parcel of land in the sought after neighborhood of Clifton Springs. The Golf Club and beach are just down the road and all that the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula has to offer is on your doorstep including amazing award winning wineries. Call for an inspection today!

Description:
Brick Beauty Only Minutes to the Bay
Located only a mere 250 metres from the water's edge, this home offers a rare buying opportunity. A solid foundation very livable as is or potential for those who want to update, a great investment opportunity for the savvy investor or a low maintenance lock up and leave' holiday home in a tightly held pocket of Clifton Springs, this home offers true value for money.
Located on a generous 585m2 block, you're welcomed by a private high fence and completely secure front garden. Upon entry to the home, you're invited by a spacious 1st living area with exposed timber beams, brick feature wall and open fireplace which oozes an automatic sense of warmth and charm. The dining area sits adjacent and continues into the fully equipped kitchen with gas cooktop, electric oven, dishwasher and ample cupboard space. A flexible 2nd living/dining area effortlessly flows and offers itself in a multitude of ways, while complete by a quirky in-built bar and sliding doors to the back garden. 3 large and light-filled bedrooms all host built-in-robes, while the main comprises an en-suite with oversized shower, vanity and toilet. A central bathroom with feature tiled in bath, shower and vanity, a 2nd separate toilet and laundry complete this solid, neat package.
The SLUG is fully equipped and could easily be utilised as an additional gaming/rumpus room, while a separate nifty workshop area is also on offer. The low maintenance back garden boasts a stunning sundrenched aspect, mature lemon tree and an additional garden shed.
Additional features include; Split system heating and cooling, 2 gas heaters, completely secure and private front garden with sliding door access from the dining area and plenty of room for additional cars, boats, caravans, trailers and everything in between.
Location is everything and this humble abode offers the most enviable! A 3-minute walk has you dipping your toes in the Bay or a cliff top walk where you can take in 180-degree westerly views, where the most stunning sunsets can be experienced. Public transport and shops sit only 100 metres away, while schools, cafes and major local amenities are all at your fingertips. Whether you are looking to invest or nest, don't miss this unique opportunity to secure your Bellarine dream!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property
Insights: 23 Centaurus Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

NOTHING TO DO , EASY TO MAINTAIN AND SO CLOSE TO THE BAY.

Open plan area includes kitchen, meals and living with doors opening to paved courtyard., second light filled lounge room Three bedrooms , master with WIR and ensuite , two with BIR'S, even a study nook, central bathroom and laundry. Features include central heating, split system, stainless steel appliances , pantry, excellent storage, water tank and more. Single lock up garage and open space for another. Take the time to inspect and consider your options.

Description:
Sunsets & Bay Views
Imagine enjoying a quiet drink on the rear deck as the sun sets over the bay and distant hills. This 585m2 block has the potential for views over the bay to the lights of Geelong. 15 metre frontage and 38 metre depth provides a significant footprint on which to build an impressive 2 storey or split level home (STCA). The block also contains a single colorbond garage and established fruit trees tucked away in the corner. Located in the heart of Clifton Springs and within walking distance of the beach, golf club and boat ramp. Start drawing your plans.

Description:
Modern Living In A Natural Bush Setting
The Feel:
Positioned for peace and privacy with a tranquil bushland aspect to the rear, this neat and tidy 4BR home offers more than most, with four separate living zones just perfect for a growing family! Central to great schools, and metres from the local playground; this spacious property would be an ideal entry into the thriving Clifton Springs market or a great addition to any investment portfolio.
The Facts:
-Modern family design features 4BRs and multiple living zones
-Set within a quiet street with only local traffic on 648sqm approx.
-Huge kitchen features great prep space, ss appliances and d/w
-Carpeted formal lounge, tiled living and dining, and rumpus to rear
-Sliding door to large courtyard, and backyard with bush outlook
-Minor BR wing with tiled family bathroom and children’s retreat
-Master with WIR and tiled ensuite with shower, vanity and WC
-Great investment with demonstrated rental demand within the area
-Gas ducted heating and SSAC, DLUG with rear roller door to yard
-Short drive to preferred schools, with buses into Geelong nearby
-Only four houses away from local children’s playground
-Walk via reserve to the Golf Course, and straight onto the beach!
-Moments to surf beaches, wineries and coastal towns of the Bellarine
The Owner Loves….
“There’s space for everyone, families with kids will really appreciate the retreat zoned with the minor bedrooms. It’s a lovely quiet spot, and the bush aspect and natural reserves add to the beauty of the area.”
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information that is passed on. Bellarine Property will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information.

Description:
PRICED TO SELL NOW ! VIEWS, WALK TO THE JETTY ......GREAT OPPORTUNITY.
This home is just around the corner from the water, has a tenant who would love to stay if able, some maintenance work that could be done in time while enjoying the comfort of home. Downstairs lounge room with space for second dining /study, kitchen/ meals with doors opening to leafy outdoor entertaining space. Three bedrooms downstairs all with BIR'S , central bathroom, laundry and toilet. Upstairs a real surprise, big second living opening to balcony as well as the huge master bedroom with ensuite and BIR'S. Features include central heating, 2 split systems, outdoor blinds, good storage and more. The matured garden frames the home and could be enhanced further if wished. Carport, big shed, make an appointment now or inspect on open day.
Insights: 3 Goondiwindi Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Start Right Here!
Whether you are looking for your first home, first investment or possibly your first renovation, then take note of this opportunity. Offering a very liveable three bedroom brick veneer home with a single lock up garage and set on approximately 570m2 of land. The homes features include built in robes in all the bedrooms, good sized bathroom with a corner shower and separate spa bath. The kitchen has all electric appliances and is well located to the light and bright north facing living room or the separate dining room, which could also be used as a study.
The large backyard is ideal for the kids or pets, and for the golf lover, the Clifton Springs Course is only a short walk away. With plenty of choice schooling and two nearby shopping centres, and the bay, you will love the lifestyle this property offers.
Terms: 10% Deposit and 60 Settlement or sooner by agreement.
Insights: 12 Bahloo Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
The Four Seasons!
This beautiful residence set within a boutique pocket of Clifton Springs is the ultimate four seasons lifestyle home! Here is just a hint to what are some of the seasonal delights on offer at 37 Coronae Drive:
-A trio of mature Robina Inermis trees promote lovely afternoon shade and the enviable orientation invites cool summer bay breezes on a balmy evening
-A spring bloom ensures a wonderful pallet of colour and welcomes a wide array of local birdlife
-From the elevated site you can witness the everchanging landscape of the Clifton Springs Golf Course during a classic autumn
Three bedrooms of grand proportions will impress prospective purchasers who value 'space'; the master is complete with ensuite, walk in robe and a ceiling fan. A 4th equally generous zone offers further flexibility for a 4th bedroom/study
The primary living zone consists of a beautifully appointed kitchen, a defined meals area and relaxed lounge setting with lovely filtered light. A glass sliding door creates a seamless connection to the brick paved alfresco zone and further endorses this property's suitability for the 'entertainer'
The kitchen itself 'serves up' a practical zone with quality fixtures; 25mm expansive stone benchtops, a walk in pantry, custom cabinetry (complete with drawers and a lazy susan) feature tile splashback and stainless steel appliances
Second living area showcases an abundance of natural light and great use of windows invites the wonderful landscaped gardens in
Excellent storage solutions are a consistent theme throughout and highlight the user friendly nature of this property
Beautifully manicured gardens are cleverly laid out as a 'room theme' feature and create zones which will delight all your senses
Set within a tightly held pocket of Clifton Springs; the water's edge only a short stroll away
A double remote controlled garage and further off street parking
An inclusions list simply too long to complete but a few to note are as follows: solar panels, dual water tanks with pump, garden shed, ornamental bird bath, ducted heating and cooling and many more features to be discovered on inspection
Insights: 37 Coronae Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect Start or Savvy Investment The Choice is Yours!
Positioned in a sought-after pocket of Clifton Springs, this humble abode is an ideal starter or perfection addition to your investment portfolio.
Drenched in natural light and offering subtle Bay views, this elevated home offers a sense of openness and airiness which is felt throughout.
The picture-perfect undercover front verandah leads you to the front door, where you are welcomed with hardwood timber floors and quaint raked ceilings. The updated and well-appointed kitchen offers stainless steel appliances with electric cooking and dishwasher, ample storage and overlooks an open plan living and dining space. The central hallway invites you to 3 spacious bedrooms, with the master equipped with built-in-robes, the renovated bathroom offering oversized shower, spa-bath, vanity and toilet, while the fully equipped laundry and 2nd separate toilet completes this neat package.
Situated upon a generous 585m2 block, a SLUG and single carport are on offer, with more than enough room for additional cars, boats, caravans and everything in between. A low maintenance and fully secure back garden offer an open lush grass space, equipped with a garden shed for additional storage.
Currently tenanted for $340 per week until December 2019, for the savvy investor this home is a unique opportunity to secure a property with tenants already in place. An equally as great opportunity for First Home Buyers, who can take advantage of immediate cash flow until the end of the year. Either way you look at it, this home offers itself in a multitude of ways - First Home Buyers, Downsizers, Investment or a low maintenance holiday home, the choice is yours! One thing is for sure however - with the demand and growth seen on The Bellarine Peninsula of late, you do not want to miss this opportunity at an incredible entry level price!
*All information about the property has been provided to hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Address: 91 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
LIVE THE HIGH LIFE !
Sitting proudly in an elevated position on approx 600m2 parcel of land is this modern, well maintained family home in a fantastic location just down the road from the pristine beaches of The Dell and Clifton Springs Golf Club plus award winning Bellarine Peninsula wineries, all on your doorstep!
This delightful home features a lovely open plan kitchen, dining and living space downstairs leading out to a paved entertainment area, as well as a study, powder room and laundry. The upstairs space comprises 3 generous bedrooms, bathroom, Master suite which enjoys views of the bay plus a fantastic kids activity area. Outside enjoys a low maintenance garden and single car accomodation completes the home. If you are looking to downsize in a fantastic location or seeking an ideal investment opportunity, then look no further! Call for an inspection today.

Address: 24 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
It's all about the location.
They say location is everything so when a home like 24 Country Club Drive presents itself to the market the astute buyer will enjoy the proximity the home is to the Clifton Springs foreshore. This versatile property, totalling 585m2 (approx.), presents itself as the perfect, downsizer, first home or solid investment. Featuring a classic floorplan design, complemented with 3 bedrooms, with the master bedroom having its own ensuite and walk in robe. The home also features a spacious kitchen and dining area and 2 living areas. This well presented family home is located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, a short stroll to public transport, excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private, multiple choice of shopping centres close by & access to the Bellarine Peninsula's world class restaurants & wineries. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.
Photo ID Required

Description:
Walk to the beach or boat ramp - just 600 meters!
Bay views feature here at this 4 bedroom brick veneer family home which oozes potential in an impressive location just 600 meters away from the bay for a swim or the boat ramp. Enter in to a great open plan living styled with new floor coverings throughout. Large lounge flows through to open plan kitchen & dining. Kitchen has gas 4 burner cook top & electric wall oven with a big pantry. Just down the hall you have not one, but two linen cupboards ideal for all the pool towels. Bedrooms 2, 3 & 4 are all generous in size & have built in robes. Central bathroom has a new seperate shower & bath with a stylish vanity. Upstairs is the second living area with amazing bay views, you can sit, watch the ships cruise through the channel all day long! Wake up to the you yangs every day from the master bedroom which has full en-suite & walk in robe. Also upstairs we have either a 5th bedroom, study or home office, this room is your choice. Desirable built in bar to entertain with a secret door for extra storage access in the roof. Outside your resort lifestyle awaits you with a paved under cover garden zone that leads you down to the in ground pool plus plenty of yard to sit and watch the kids swim & play. A massive garden shed is 6x3 meters & double gates giving you rear yard access to the backyard ideal for storage of a boat, Jet Ski or trailer. The long drive way easily fits 3 cars with a single carport at the end. Additional features are freshly painted inside & outside, 18 self-cleaning solar panels on the roof, 2 reverse cycle split systems & ceiling fans throudhout. All this sits on a fantastic 585m2 block just a mere 350 meter stroll to the scenic cliff top walking trails, the Clifton Springs boat ramp & swimming beach. Also just up the down the road is your choice of multiple local public or private school's, tennis club, skate park, milk bar, fish'n'chips & 200 meter walk to access public transport. With local shopping centers, cafes, chemists and doctors a few minutes' drive, everything you need is at your doorstep!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property

Description:
Clifton Springs Charm
If you desire the ultimate sea change this charming property is sure to excite!
From its elevated position this home showcases glorious views of the bay, the impressive granite peaks of the You Yangs and the distant rolling green hills of the Bellarine Peninsula. Further to that it delivers a user-friendly design to accommodate the boat, caravan and even the jet ski.
The wonderfully adaptable floor plan serves up options aplenty; spacious family home, dual living/income and a fine example of a lifestyle property prospect
4 bedrooms; inclusive of a fully self-contained downstairs studio (kitchenette, laundry and living zone)
A beautifully appointed primary living zone occupies the entire upper level. Character filled features including Coonara, exposed brick feature walls and the open plan design opens to a decked alfresco with commanding views
The kitchen serves up a space fit for the chef; expansive bench tops, excellent storage solutions and modernised appliances.
All the modern comforts and an impressive inclusions list to be discovered upon inspection
A double garage/workshop and additional off street car accommodation further endorses the fine lifestyle this home offers. A secure family/pet friendly yard and productive fruit trees create a welcoming home feel.
A prime land holding of approximately 585m2 within a tranquil green leafy pocket of Clifton Springs completes a very pretty picture
Insights: 23 Whitcombes Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Prime Commercial Site on the Bellarine
This excellent corner block sits at the top of the Dumburra Avenue shopping strip in Clifton Springs and has the advantage of two retail frontages.
Business owners and smart investors will recognise the real potential for success here, with the opportunity to build a retail store, showroom, or office on the ground level, and a residential apartment on the first floor (STCA). This concept is enhanced by the stunning views across the bay to the You Yangs beyond.
The impressive parcel of land is cleared, and measures approximately 186 square metres. It joins a successful group of retail shops and offices in the shopping strip, with plenty of parking available. Just moments from the Portarlington Road, the site provides easy access for customers and deliveries alike.
Insights: 23 Dumburra Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Premium coastal views in the heart of the Bellarine!
At the end of a quiet cul de sac lies an opportunity to build your dream coastal property. From your large elevated block, capture incredible views of the bay overlooking the You Yangs and simply sit back, and watch the gentle boating traffic whilst you have your morning coffee.
Located close to all that the Bellarine has to offer, including wineries, beaches, schools and golf courses, this property is also 10 minutes from the Portarlington- Melbourne ferry. Commuting to Melbourne CBD has never been easier. Geelong city is mere 30 mins away which offers plenty of schooling options for families seeking a seachange.
Build your dream home in this prime coastal locale, close to some of Victorias best beaches.
Insights: 9 Waterford Place, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019.
